languages.text: {n}Капюшон отбрасывает назад бледная рука. Вы видите уродливое лицо — плоский приплюснутый широкий нос, непомерно мощные надбровные дуги, глаза без радужки, но с огромными зрачками, по-жабьи широкий рот и кожа, превращающаяся на скулах в сиреневую чешую. Перед вами гнусный недочеловек, мутант.{/n} "Добро пожаловать в обитель Кормителей".

{n}With a pale hand, he throws back his hood. You see an ugly face, with a flat, wide nose, disproportionately large brow ridges, irisless eyes with enormous pupils, a wide toadlike mouth, and skin that transitions to purple scales at the cheekbones. Standing before you is an abominable subhuman, a mutant.{/n} "Welcome to the abode of the Nourishers."
languages.original_text: {n}Капюшон отбрасывает назад бледная рука. Вы видите уродливое лицо — плоский приплюснутый широкий нос, непомерно мощные надбровные дуги, глаза без радужки, но с огромными зрачками, по-жабьи широкий рот и кожа, превращающаяся на скулах в сиреневую чешую. Перед вами гнусный недочеловек, мутант.{/n} "Добро пожаловать в обитель Кормителей".

{n}With a pale hand, he throws back his hood. You see an ugly face, with a flat, wide nose, disproportionately large brow ridges, irisless eyes with enormous pupils, a wide toadlike mouth, and skin that transitions to purple scales at the cheekbones. Standing before you is an abominable subhuman, a mutant.{/n} "Welcome to the abode of the Nourishers."

languages.text: {n}Con una mano pálida, se retira la capucha. Su cara es espantosamente fea. Su nariz es ancha y chata, sus cejas son desproporcionadamente grandes, sus ojos carecen de iris y tienen pupilas enormes, su boca encajaría más en un sapo que en un ser humano y su piel da paso a escamas de color morado en los pómulos. Tienes ante ti a un aborrecible subhumano. Un mutante.{/n} «Os doy la bienvenida a la morada de los Nutridores».
languages.original_text: {n}With a pale hand, he throws back his hood. You see an ugly face, with a flat, wide nose, disproportionately large brow ridges, irisless eyes with enormous pupils, a wide toadlike mouth, and skin that transitions to purple scales at the cheekbones. Standing before you is an abominable subhuman, a mutant.{/n} "Welcome to the abode of the Nourishers."

traits.locale_text: {n}Con una mano pálida, se retira la capucha. Su cara es espantosamente fea. Su nariz es ancha y chata, sus cejas son desproporcionadamente grandes, sus ojos carecen de iris y tienen pupilas enormes, su boca encajaría más en un sapo que en un ser humano y su piel da paso a escamas de color morado en los pómulos. Tienes ante ti a un aborrecible subhumano. Un mutante.{/n} «Os doy la bienvenida a la morada de los Nutridores».

languages.text: {n}他用苍白的手将兜帽向后一甩，露出了一张丑陋的脸。脸上长着平坦宽大的鼻子、不成比例的宽眉毛、有着巨大瞳孔却没有虹膜的眼睛、宽大的蛤蟆嘴，颧骨处的皮肤还长着紫色的鳞片。站在你面前的是一位面目可憎的亚人类，一只变种人。{/n}“欢迎来到滋养者的居所。”
languages.original_text: {n}With a pale hand, he throws back his hood. You see an ugly face, with a flat, wide nose, disproportionately large brow ridges, irisless eyes with enormous pupils, a wide toadlike mouth, and skin that transitions to purple scales at the cheekbones. Standing before you is an abominable subhuman, a mutant.{/n} "Welcome to the abode of the Nourishers."

traits.locale_text: {n}他用苍白的手将兜帽向后一甩，露出了一张丑陋的脸。脸上长着平坦宽大的鼻子、不成比例的宽眉毛、有着巨大瞳孔却没有虹膜的眼睛、宽大的蛤蟆嘴，颧骨处的皮肤还长着紫色的鳞片。站在你面前的是一位面目可憎的亚人类，一只变种人。{/n}“欢迎来到滋养者的居所。”

languages.text: {n}男は青白い手でフードを外すと、醜い顔が露わになる。ペチャっとした大きな鼻、顔に比べて大きすぎる眉弓、瞳孔が嫌に開いた虹彩の見えない目、ヒキガエルのような大きな口、そして頬骨で紫色の鱗に変わった肌。目の前の男は忌まわしきヒトモドキ、変異体だ。{/n}「ナリッシャーの住処へようこそ」
languages.original_text: {n}With a pale hand, he throws back his hood. You see an ugly face, with a flat, wide nose, disproportionately large brow ridges, irisless eyes with enormous pupils, a wide toadlike mouth, and skin that transitions to purple scales at the cheekbones. Standing before you is an abominable subhuman, a mutant.{/n} "Welcome to the abode of the Nourishers."

traits.locale_text: {n}男は青白い手でフードを外すと、醜い顔が露わになる。ペチャっとした大きな鼻、顔に比べて大きすぎる眉弓、瞳孔が嫌に開いた虹彩の見えない目、ヒキガエルのような大きな口、そして頬骨で紫色の鱗に変わった肌。目の前の男は忌まわしきヒトモドキ、変異体だ。{/n}「ナリッシャーの住処へようこそ」

languages.text: {n}Mit einer blassen Hand schiebt er seine Kapuze zurück. Du siehst ein hässliches Gesicht mit einer platten, breiten Nase, unverhältnismäßig großen Augenwülsten, Augen ohne Iris, aber mit enormen Pupillen, einem breiten, krötenähnlichen Mund und einer Haut, die an den Wangenknochen in violette Schuppen übergeht. Vor dir steht ein abscheulicher Mutant.{/n} "Willkommen in der Heimstatt der Nährer!"
languages.original_text: {n}With a pale hand, he throws back his hood. You see an ugly face, with a flat, wide nose, disproportionately large brow ridges, irisless eyes with enormous pupils, a wide toadlike mouth, and skin that transitions to purple scales at the cheekbones. Standing before you is an abominable subhuman, a mutant.{/n} "Welcome to the abode of the Nourishers."

traits.locale_text: {n}Mit einer blassen Hand schiebt er seine Kapuze zurück. Du siehst ein hässliches Gesicht mit einer platten, breiten Nase, unverhältnismäßig großen Augenwülsten, Augen ohne Iris, aber mit enormen Pupillen, einem breiten, krötenähnlichen Mund und einer Haut, die an den Wangenknochen in violette Schuppen übergeht. Vor dir steht ein abscheulicher Mutant.{/n} "Willkommen in der Heimstatt der Nährer!"

languages.text: {n}D'une main pâle, il retire sa capuche et révèle un visage d'une grande laideur : le nez plat et large, les arcades sourcilières disproportionnellement épaisses, les yeux sans iris aux pupilles énormes, la bouche large comme celle d'un crapaud et la peau couverte d'écailles violettes au niveau des pommettes. Devant vous se tient un abominable sous-homme, un mutant.{/n} « Bienvenue chez les Nourrisseurs. »
languages.original_text: {n}With a pale hand, he throws back his hood. You see an ugly face, with a flat, wide nose, disproportionately large brow ridges, irisless eyes with enormous pupils, a wide toadlike mouth, and skin that transitions to purple scales at the cheekbones. Standing before you is an abominable subhuman, a mutant.{/n} "Welcome to the abode of the Nourishers."

traits.locale_text: {n}D'une main pâle, il retire sa capuche et révèle un visage d'une grande laideur : le nez plat et large, les arcades sourcilières disproportionnellement épaisses, les yeux sans iris aux pupilles énormes, la bouche large comme celle d'un crapaud et la peau couverte d'écailles violettes au niveau des pommettes. Devant vous se tient un abominable sous-homme, un mutant.{/n} « Bienvenue chez les Nourrisseurs. »

languages.text: {n}Soluk eliyle kukuletasını kaldırıp geriye atıyor. Dümdüz, geniş bir burnun yanı sıra orantısız kaşlar, devasa göz bebeklerinin ele geçirdiği irissiz gözler, kurbağayı andıran bir ağız ve elmacık kemiklerinden itibaren morumsu pullara dönüşen derisiyle oldukça çirkin bir yüzle karşılaşıyorsun. Karşında tüyler ürperten bir mutant duruyor.{/n} "Besleyenler'in iskânına hoş geldiniz."
languages.original_text: {n}With a pale hand, he throws back his hood. You see an ugly face, with a flat, wide nose, disproportionately large brow ridges, irisless eyes with enormous pupils, a wide toadlike mouth, and skin that transitions to purple scales at the cheekbones. Standing before you is an abominable subhuman, a mutant.{/n} "Welcome to the abode of the Nourishers."
